image_prompts.title: Aurora Fox
image_prompts.description: A single majestic Fox with a sleek, galaxy-filled fur coat and glowing eyes, standing on all fours in a proud pose. The fox is positioned on a rocky asteroid drifting in space under a vivid, colorful nebula sky. Distant stars and glowing celestial clouds fill the background. Anime-style lighting with high contrast and deep cosmic colors.
image_prompts.negative_prompt: extra limbs, extra heads, distorted anatomy, disjointed body parts, surreal shapes, blurry textures, missing features, duplicated elements, glitch effects, malformed faces
